desc: Myviprints is an online store that sells apparel and paraphernalia related to both the U.S. and British Virgin Islands. Whether you grew up in the virgin islands, have visited or would simply like to purchase a gift for a friend or family member, you have truly come to the right place.

layout.text: Show your VI pride with myVIPrints
Wherever you are you can represent the Virgin Islands with exquisite clothing and merchandise!
